name: Angular-validation-messages
tagline: A highly customizable set of directives for AngularJS to create and display validation messages for forms, and increase your app's usability.
body:

angular-validation-messages
===========================

A highly customizable set of directives for AngularJS to create and display validation messages for forms, and increase your app's usability.
